Uses of Class
com.fluidops.ajax.FClientUpdate

  • Packages that use FClientUpdate 
    Package Description
    com.fluidops.ajax
    A set of Ajax components which allows bringing backend driven UIs to the browser seamlessly.
    com.fluidops.ajax.components
    collection of components / widgets such as trees, table,s inputboxes, etc.

      represents a UI update sent from the backend to the frontend as a response in case of error
